jump_scares.spoiler: A vehicle suddenly crashes into Michelle’s car
A loud noise startles Michelle
Howard bangs his fist on the table loudly
A disfigured woman bangs on the window
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
A knife suddenly pierces the air vent in front of Michelle
A knife once again pierces the air vent
Michelle runs over the mailbox
The alien’s tongue comes out of its mouth and slams into the glass barrier
An alien hand grabs Dr. Gediman and pulls him into the hole
A broken hose drops down and starts hissing behind Elgyn. [Video]
An apparently dead man suddenly jumps up and yells
A Face Hugger jumps on to Ripley’s face
Purvis is suddenly shot
The alien snaps at Ripley
An alien roars from behind Call
The dying alien suddenly roars at Call once more
A Facehugger jumps out of the egg and lands on Kane’s helmet
Dallas accidentally kicks something over, causing Ripley to cry out in surprise
The Facehugger drops onto Ripley’s shoulder
The Facehugger twitches as Ash pokes it
Blood spurts out of Kane’s chest and a few seconds later an alien bursts out of it
A cat hisses and runs away
The alien comes into view behind Brett
An alien appears in front of Dallas. [Video]
Ash grabs Parker
The cat jumps out at Ripley
An alien hand extends out in front of Ripley
The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
One of the Heptapods places a tentacle on the barrier near where Louise is standing
During a dream where Louise is talking to Ian in her room, Louise looks up and Ian has been replaced by a Heptapod
The Heptapod places a tentacle on the barrier causing Louise and Ian to be pushed back by an unseen force
Something appears to move in front of the camera which is filming the two astronauts on the moon and there is a loud burst of static
The camera zooms in on Nate, who is snoring, he suddenly opens his eyes and yells (as a joke)
Ben uses his camera to light up the crater, suddenly the camera flash illuminates the corpse of one of the Russian cosmonauts
The dead cosmonauts appears to jerk violently as Ben looks through his suit
There is several loud bangs and the camera that is viewing the Russian lander suddenly tips over
Nate suddenly shatters the rock with a hammer as Ben examines it
Nate, who appears to be sleeping, suddenly grabs Ben’s arm
Nate is pulled into the crater
Nate bangs on the window of the lander just as Ben is about to launch
Nate’s head explodes
Whitley jumps out at his wife Anne from behind a wall to scare her as a joke
There is a sudden flash of light accompanied by a loud sound
The curtains are suddenly pulled open by alien hands
A person in a Halloween costume jumps out from behind a table
A floating robot glides into the room, followed by a cut to it quickly flying towards Whitley
Whitley suddenly jolts awake from the hypnosis and begins to scream
The house lights turn on by themselves
Sam grabs Lacy’s top when she is looking at the oddly stacked dishes
A bird hits the window when Lacy is looking outside
A flock of birds start flying into the window
Lacy walks in on a dark alien-like silhouette standing in Sam’s room. [Video
Lacy walks to the window and starts hitting her head against it
Lights turn on to reveal Daniel standing outside
Daniel’s nose starts bleeding
Daniel spins Sam over in his bed to reveal his eyes are red. [Video
A silhouette stands behind Lacy
When Lacy walks into a room the door slams behind her
Lights flicker and Silhouettes appear in front of the TV
A monkey jumps against a cage and screeches
A pipe comes loose causing The Kid to shoot his gun
Something jumps down onto a table behind Portman and Goat
Dr. Carmack grabs Samantha while lying on the operating table
Destroyer pokes his head through a hole and is attacked by a monkey. [Video]
Portman is pulled under the water
Goat is attacked by a creature
A creature jumps out at John
Samantha runs into Duke
Mac is suddenly beheaded
A creature grabs Destroyer
A creature’s hand reaches down and grabs Portman around the face. [Video]
Several infected people suddenly rush at the remaining soldiers
For a 5 minute period, the camera switches to John’s first person POV and various creatures leap out suddenly and attack John
Sarge bursts through a glass wall behind John
A distressed woman appears on screen
Bright lights flash accompanied by loud sound effects
The telephone booth crashes down behind the shop attendant
April walks backwards into a masked man holding an axe
The lights turn off suddenly
The fuse box sparks
Loud banging can be heard from upstairs
A flash of lightning illuminates an alien outside walking towards the house
Lex is suddenly lifted into the alien ship
On some camera footage, a girl is suddenly abducted into the alien ship
A woman bursts out of a closet
Travis grabs Seth and puts a knife to his neck
An alien silhouette appears behind Travis
Travis, who is hiding underneath a bed, sees some alien feet
An alien hand grabs Travis around the face
A bang can be heard from the other side of the door
April looks through the peep hole in the door and sees an alien eye
A loud noise startles the sheriff
An alien runs quickly past the sheriff
The sheriff turns the car lights on to reveal an alien standing in front of the car
April appears by the car window beside Seth
There is a loud noise and a red light illuminates the room
After a momentary silence there is a loud noise and flashing blue lights
The floor boards begin to break up
Seth is attacked by an alien
Kyle approaches a mirror, suddenly an alien hand bursts through and grabs him
Something sparks near April
The power suddenly comes back on
The probe device suddenly opens
The alien/human hybrid opens its eyes
Bea screams as Paul touches her
The computer makes a noise and turns off suddenly while Paul is using it
The alien creature twitches on the bed
There is a sound effect as Zoe speaks behind Max
A gunshot is heard
There is a sudden knocking at the door
There is a sudden cut back to the group with a sound effect
The lights go out behind Zoe
Haley appears at the window
As Sarah steps outside, the homeless man walks right in front of her
The Engineer’s head explodes
Accompanied by a sound effect, something falls off one of the dead creatures that Filfield and Milburn are examining
Meredith is startled by Janek playing a note on his accordion
The snake-like creature latches onto Milburn’s hand
One of the snake-like creatures shoots out of Milburn’s mouth
Dr. Shaw suddenly jumps off the operating table
One of the giant alien’s arms appears in front of the door that Dr. Shaw is looking through
An alien like figure can be seen on the roof
Graham’s dog leaps at him
Merrill watches video footage of a children’s birthday party where an alien comes into view. [Video]
Graham sees an alien claw underneath the pantry door. [Video]
Loud banging noises can be heard
More banging noises are heard
An alien hand grabs Morgan from behind. [Video]
An alien can be seen in the reflection of TV. [Video]
A loud buzzing noise wakes everyone up
Britton pulls the front door curtain, and a wolf-like creature jumps at the window
Cameron walks towards the corner of the attic and a bat flies out at him
The lights turn back on and a tall monster is standing right in front of the camera
The wolf creature walks away as Cameron gets closer to the car window. Suddenly, it runs back to the car and hits it
The alien creature shoots a parasite into Grant
Grant suddenly jumps up and grabs Brenda
Grant suddenly appears beside Starla
A dead dog suddenly falls onto Starla. [Video]
As Starla walks past the window while on the phone, Grant can be seen watching her from outside
Starla opens the door and Grant is standing outside
Kylie runs into her mother as she tries to escape the parasite
One of the infected policemen suddenly sits up
Starla suddenly shoots one of the infected men in the head
A figure quickly moves past the camera as Bill tries to use the phone
The nurse screams when she sees the blob, and loud music begins to play
Steve gets startled by Jane when he walks around the corner
After Steve goes off screen, there’s a loud sound of cans falling down
A strange shrieking noise resounds through the spaceship
Tam puts her head up to the wall, after several seconds silence we hear the shrieking noise again accompanied by a thud from the other side of the wall
A section of wall is removed to reveal a screaming woman who appears to be fused to the wiring of the space ship
The Foosball figures start to spin rapidly by themselves
Accompanied by a sound effect, Volkov’s eye moves while he is looking in the mirror
Worms suddenly burst out of Volkov’s mouth
The wall panel suddenly traps Mundy’s arm
A monster bursts through the clouds
A car crashes into Jess and Matt’s car from the side
As Matt approaches the closet, Jess jumps out to scare him
After a hand reaches out from behind, Matt is suddenly pulled away
As Matt reaches for Trey’s phone a hand suddenly grabs him
A loud sound may startle some viewers
While Trey is talking into the camera a hand suddenly grabs him
Matt is suddenly dragged away
After a sudden loud growl Julia turns around to see the monster running at her
The balloons pop after Matt says “they’re here.”
Jess gets pulled into the sky
A car slams into the car that Telly and Ash are in
Agent Petalis is suddenly sucked through the roof at great speed by an unseen force. [Video]
Anne Pope is sucked off the ground and disappears into the sky. [Video]
While chasing Sam, Telly runs around a corner and sees the agent standing in front of her
The agent’s face suddenly distorts and the windows around him blow out
The agent grabs Telly around the neck
The agent is sucked through the roof of the hangar
Gayson suddenly jumps out of his seat and lunges over the table
Gayson runs up to the car from outside and loudly bangs on the window
One of the men bangs his hand on the car window to scare the others as a joke
An alien runs out into the road in front of the motorcycle
The cameraman turns around and an alien runs across the field near them
The boarded window suddenly explodes and an alien reaches in and grabs one of the men
There is a sudden explosion outside
The cameraman turns around and an alien crashes through the boards and begins chasing them
The cameraman turns the camera at an alien who lunges forward at him
An alien foot stomps down in front of the camera
Lars scares Derek by shouting “boo” from behind him
The creature suddenly escapes from the block of ice. [Video]
One of The Thing’s tentacles shoots out and impales Henrik
As Lars enters a building, he is grabbed by something and pulled inside
A miniature “Thing” jumps at Kate
The Thing bursts through a window in front of Carter
One of The Thing’s tentacles suddenly lashes out at Kate as she inches towards the grenade
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
A dog leaps out at Clark
Something moves past a doorway in front of Fuchs
Norris and Nauls attack MacReady from behind
Copper attempts to defibrillate Norris when a giant hole opens in Norris’s chest. [Video]
Palmer’s blood has a violent reaction when MacReady tests it with the copper wire
Blair appears behind Garry
The ground begins to erupt in front of MacReady
